articles.description: All the latest transfer news and gossip, plus reaction to Rangers' draw with PSV Eindhoven in the Champions League play-off.
articles.title: Transfers latest & Champions League reaction

articles.description: Female footballers campaigning for equality means they are "playing two games at the same time", says former United States international Megan Rapinoe.
articles.title: Women playing two games at same time - Rapinoe

articles.description: Number eight Billy Vunipola will miss England's opening game of the World Cup against Argentina following his red card against Ireland.
articles.title: Vunipola to miss World Cup opener after red card

articles.description: More than 17,000 defeats, just one 52-year-old victory. What it is really like to play for the Washington Generals, the most famous, and consistent, losers in sport?
articles.title: One win, 17,000 defeats - life as a Washington General

articles.description: Rachel Riley accuses Manchester United of "gaslighting" and "green lighting" abuse for their handling of the decision to part company with Mason Greenwood.
articles.title: Riley accuses Man Utd of 'gaslighting' over Greenwood

articles.description: Watch the best moments from day 22 of The Hundred at Headingley, including Harry Brook and Adam Hose's sensational relay catch.
articles.title: Brook & Hose pull off one of best-ever relay catches

articles.description: Britain's Matthew Hudson-Smith sets a European 400m record to show he is ready to contend for gold at the World Championships.
articles.title: Hudson-Smith eyes gold after European record

articles.description: Ferrari team principal Frederic Vasseur says it would be "strange" to change the result of the 2008 world championship 15 years after events.
articles.title: Massa's claim to Hamilton's title 'strange' - Vasseur

articles.description: Exhausting, terrific and anxious, a night to remember for Rangers' new recruits offers hope of Champions League group progression, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Pulsating Ibrox induction offers hope for new-look Rangers

articles.description: Unified heavyweight world champion Oleksandr Usyk's promoter says "it's our obligation" to deliver an undisputed fight against Tyson Fury.
articles.title: 'Usyk has obligation to face Fury in undisputed bout'
